LanguageData.VBE_MakeCigarettes.label: make cigarettes
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCigarettes.description: Make a small, rolled paper tube stuffed loosely with tobacco leaves.
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCigars.label: make cigars
LanguageData.VBE_MakeCigars.description: Make a fat, dried tobacco leaf stuffed to the brim with more tobacco leaves and a gold foil wrap around it.
